content: basic knowledge and mastery of chain stitches slip stitches single crochets and double crochets is required you will receive a pdf document which can be downloaded you can make this beautiful heart using the african flowers technique you will receive a detailed and illustrated pattern for making the flowers and then assembling them into a heart the heart is very suitable as an introduction to the african flowers technique size of the finished figure approx 10-12 cm cotton crochet yarn 115-125 m / 50 g crochet hook 3 0 mm d/3 10 total consumption approx 20 g stuffing material
